# devices

**Instance Property**

An array of connected devices.

## Declaration

```swift
var devices: [CMIOExtensionDevice] { get }
```

## Discussion

This property isn’t key-value observable.

## Managing Devices

- **addDevice(_:)**: Adds a device to a provider.
- **removeDevice(_:)**: Removes a device from a provider.

items.description: Adds a device to a provider.
items.name: addDevice(_:)

items.description: Removes a device from a provider.
items.name: removeDevice(_:)
